room_title: Escape room "Island Escape" by Breakout Games - Virginia Beach in Virginia Beach
review: Very fun I went with my son and daughter,   one of the locks was unlocked and the medicine cabinet was broken but still a fun experience  for all people 4 out of 5 stars

room_title: Escape room "Island Escape" by Breakout Games - Virginia Beach in Virginia Beach
review: This is the best place in VB for escape rooms. The rooms are awesome and the staff is great. Other rooms limit you to 3 questions and aren't always as creative with the rooms. We have completed the 2 new rooms, Do not Disturb and Island Escape. Still hard to say which one is our favorite as they are so unique but all fun. Island Escape was a blast. Definitely check this place our and you won't be disappointed. We can't wait for more new rooms!

room_title: Escape room "Island Escape" by Breakout Games - Virginia Beach in Virginia Beach
review: We do escape games in every city we visit. We love the activity and the chance to use our brains on vacation. This was a super fun way to spend an afternoon. The staff was great. Hali was our game master and she was amazing. We did the Island Escape and it didn’t disappoint! Highly recommend!!!

room_title: Escape room "Island Escape" by Breakout Games - Virginia Beach in Virginia Beach
review: We had so much fun!!! We are definitely are planning another trip back to breakout to try a different room.

room_title: Escape room "Island Escape" by Breakout Games - Virginia Beach in Virginia Beach
review: This was a lot of fun. We did the Island Escape room and we ALMOST got all the clues. Our 7 year old grandson really liked it and so did we.

room_title: Escape room "Island Escape" by Breakout Games - Virginia Beach in Virginia Beach
review: This was awesome, we did Island Escape and our game master Andrew was super nice and gave us lots of hints even though we didn’t make it out in time I really enjoyed this room. Our second one was hostage and our game master was PB&Jordi and she was amazing as well. We made it out with less than 2 minutes to spare. We will definitely be going back!!
